index.in-this-section: In this section, you can add the children you would like to renew for by selecting the "Renew a child" button.
index.each-child: Each child must have a client number to renew their coverage. If the child does not have a client number, you will need to apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
index.dental-insurance-title: Access to private dental insurance or coverage
index.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:

modal.info: Do you want to remove {{childName}} from this application?

information.form-instructions-sin: Enter the child's name as it was provided when you first applied for the child.
information.single-legal-name: If the child has one legal name
information.name-instructions: If the child uses only one legal name, enter that name in both the first name and last name fields.
information.client-number-detail: You can find the child's client number in the upper right corner of the renewal letter from Service Canada or on your Canadian Dental Care Plan member card.
information.parent-legend: Are you the parent or legal guardian of this child?

child-not-found.heading: We could not find your child's file with the information you gave us.
child-not-found.contact-service-canada: If you need to update your child's identity information, or if this issue continues contact Service Canada by calling <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap>.

error-message.date-of-birth-day-required: Date of birth must include a day
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past: Date of birth must be in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past-valid: Date of birth too far in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-ineligible: The individual is not eligible to renew their benefits because they will be 18 as of {{coverageStartDate}}. They must submit an application as an adult to maintain their dental coverage.
error-message.date-of-birth-month-required: Date of birth must include a month
error-message.date-of-birth-valid: Day must be valid for the given month and year
error-message.date-of-birth-year-number: Year must be a number, for example 1950
error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Date of birth must include a year
error-message.is-parent: Select whether you are the parent or legal guardian of the child
error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()
error-message.first-name-no-digits: First name must contain letters only
error-message.last-name-no-digits: Last name must contain letters only

parent-or-guardian.page-title: You must be a parent or legal guardian
parent-or-guardian.must-be: You must be a parent or legal guardian.
parent-or-guardian.unable-to-apply: You are not able to apply for this child. You must be a parent or legal guardian to apply on behalf of a child.

dental-insurance.title: {{childName}}: access to private dental insurance
dental-insurance.legend: Does {{childName}} have access to private dental insurance or coverage?

list.employment: Through a parent or legal guardian's employment benefits including health and wellness accounts
list.pension: Through a parent or legal guardian's pension benefits
list.purchased: Purchased by a parent or legal guardian from an insurance or benefits company
list.professional: Through a professional or student organization

dental-insurance.option-yes: Yes, this child has access to dental insurance or coverage
dental-insurance.option-no: No, this child does not have access to dental insurance or coverage

additional-info.title: What does it mean to have access to private dental insurance or coverage?
additional-info.eligible: It means the child has access to any type of dental insurance or coverage through:

eligible-list.employment-benefits: a parent or legal guardian's employment benefits, including health and wellness accounts

organization.note: Note: If the child is eligible for dental coverage through a parent or legal guardian's employment benefits, or through a professional or student organization, they're not eligible for the CDCP. This is true even if:
organization.not-take: you decide not to take it
organization.pay-premium: you have to pay a premium for it

pension.pension-benefits: a parent or legal guardian's pension benefits
pension.federal-provincial-territorial: this includes federal, provincial and territorial government employer pension plans

exceptions.eligible: Exception: The child may still be eligible if a parent or legal guardian is retired and:
exceptions.opted-out: opted out of pension benefits before December 11, 2023, and
exceptions.opt-back: can't opt back in under the pension rules

purchased-coverage.purchased-through: coverage bought by a parent or legal guardian through a group plan from an insurance or benefits company.
purchased-coverage.purchased-privately: if a parent or legal guardian purchased the child's current dental insurance policy privately (and not as part of any of the coverage described above), the child is not eligible for the CDCP while that coverage is in effect.

error-message.dental-insurance-required: Select whether the child has access to dental insurance

confirm-dental-benefits.title: {{childName}}: access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
confirm-dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social programs will not impact the child's eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
confirm-dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If the child meets all the eligibility criteria, their coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.
confirm-dental-benefits.has-benefits-changed: Does {{childName}} have dental benefits through a federal, provincial or territorial social program aside from the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
confirm-dental-benefits.option-yes: Yes, this child has federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits.
confirm-dental-benefits.option-no: No, this child does not have federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits.

error-message.federal-provincial-territorial-benefit-r: Select whether you have federal provincial or territorial dental benefits

update-dental-benefits.title: {{childName}}: access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
update-dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social programs will not impact the child's eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
update-dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If the child meets all the eligibility criteria, their coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.

federal-benefits.title: Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: Does {{childName}} have other dental benefits through a federal social program aside from the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
federal-benefits.option-no: No, this child does not have federal benefits

social-programs.legend: Please select which social program this child is covered under. If this child has more than one, please select the one they use the most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: Does {{childName}} have other dental benefits through a provincial or territorial social program aside from the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-yes: Yes, this child has provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: No, this child does not have provincial or territorial benefits

social-programs.radio-legend: Please select which social program this child is covered under. If this child has more than one, please select the one they use the most.

error-message.federal-benefit-program-required: Select which federal program you are covered under
error-message.federal-benefit-required: Select whether you have federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-program-required: Select which provincial or territorial program you are covered under
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: Select whether you have provincial or territorial dental benefits

parent-intro.description: In this section you will review and update your information to complete the renewal application for your child(ren).

confirm-phone.add-phone: An up-to-date phone number helps the Government of Canada contact you if there's an issue with your renewal. You can find the number we have on file in the letter from Service Canada. If you don't provide a phone number, we'll contact you by mail.

add-or-update.legend: Would you like to update or add your phone number?

error-message.add-or-update-required: Select whether you would like to add or update your phone number

confirm-email.add-email: An up-to-date email helps the Government of Canada and Sun Life contact you regarding your Canadian Dental Care Plan coverage. You can find the email we have on file in the letter from Service Canada.

add-or-update.legend: Would you like to update or add your email address?

receive-comms.legend: Would you like to receive email communication from Sun Life and the Government of Canada?

error-message.add-or-update-required: Select whether you would like to add or update your email
error-message.email-match: The email addresses entered do not match
error-message.email-required: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com
error-message.confirm-email-valid: Enter confirmation of email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com
error-message.receive-comms-required: Select whether you would like to receive email communication

confirm-marital-status.has-marital-status-changed: Has your marital status or spouse changed since you applied for the Canadian Dental Care Plan?
confirm-marital-status.help-message: The marital status we have on file can also be found on the renewal letter you received from Service Canada.

error-message.has-marital-status-changed-required: Please indicate if your marital status has changed

marital-status.marital-status: What is your current marital status?
marital-status.provide-sin: Provide the Social Insurance Number (SIN) of your current spouse or common-law partner. The information is required to calculate your adjusted family net income.
marital-status.required-information: Your spouse or common-law partner must submit their own application or renewal for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
marital-status.confirm-checkbox: I confirm that my spouse or common-law partner is aware and has agreed to share their personal information.

error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Enter year of birth, for example 1950
error-message.yob-is-future: Year of birth must be in the past
error-message.sin-unique: The Social Insurance Number (SIN) must be unique

confirm-address.have-you-moved: Would you like to update your home or mailing address?
confirm-address.is-home-address-same-as-mailing-address: Is your home address the same as your mailing address?
confirm-address.help-message: The address we have on file can be found in the letter you received from Service Canada.

error-message.has-address-changed-required: Select whether you would like to update your mailing address
error-message.is-home-address-same-as-mailing-address-: Select whether or not your mailing address and home address are the same

home-address.use-mailing-address: My mailing address is the same as my home address

address-field.address-note: Include apartment number (if applicable), street number, street name. For example: 123 Main Street Suite 4B

address-suggestion.address-selection-legend: Please select an address option below:
address-suggestion.description: There's a problem with the address you provided.  Please select the address you want to use. If you live in an apartment or suite, make sure to include that information.

address-invalid.description: We could not verify your address. You can either update it or continue with the address you entered. If you live in an apartment or suite, make sure to include that information.

review-child-information.read-carefully: Review this information carefully. The information provided will be used to update your child(ren)'s Canadian Dental Care Plan member account.
review-child-information.is-parent: Parent or legal guardian of child
review-child-information.dental-insurance-title: Access to private dental insurance or coverage
review-child-information.dental-benefit-change: Change answer to government dental benefits
review-child-information.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:

exit-application.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to exit this application? If you click "Exit", the form will reset and the information will be lost.
exit-application.click-back: Click "Back" to return to the form.

demographic-survey.improve-cdcp: Answering these questions is optional. Your answers will help Health Canada improve the Canadian Dental Care Plan and make sure our services are accessible to everyone.
demographic-survey.confidential: The information collected will only be used for statistical purposes and will be kept confidential.
demographic-survey.impact-enrollment: Your completion of the demographic questions will not impact your enrolment in the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
demographic-survey.indigenous-status: Is {{memberName}} First Nations, Métis or Inuk (Inuit)?
demographic-survey.disability-status: Does {{memberName}} indentify as someone with a disability?
demographic-survey.disability-help-message: A person with a disability is a person who has a long-term difficulty or condition, such as vision, hearing, mobility, flexibility, dexterity, pain, learning, developmental, memory or mental health-related impairments, that limit their daily activities inside or outside the home such as at school, work, or in the community in general.
demographic-survey.ethnic-groups: In our society, people are often described by their race or racial background. These are not based in science, but our race may influence the way we are treated by individuals and institutions, and this may affect our health. Which category(ies) best describes {{memberName}}? Check all that apply:
demographic-survey.gender-help-message: Gender refers to current gender which may be different from sex assigned at birth and may be different from what is indicated on legal documents.

review-adult-information.read-carefully: Review this information carefully. The information provided will be used to update your Canadian Dental Care Plan member account.

spouse-consent.label: Consent
spouse-consent.yes: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
spouse-consent.no: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has not consented to sharing of their personal information.

review-adult-information.submit-p-proceed: By proceeding with this renewal, you are agreeing to attest truthfully to the information provided.
review-adult-information.submit-p-false-info: If you provide false information on your renewal, you and others you applied for, may be removed from the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
review-adult-information.submit-p-repayment: If you or your family members were not eligible to renew, you or your family member may have to repay the full cost of care received through the Canadian Dental Care Plan.

confirm.page-title: Your renewal for the Canadian Dental Care Plan is complete!
confirm.keep-copy: Print or save a copy of your application
confirm.print-copy-text: You will not receive a confirmation email. It is important to keep a copy of your application.
confirm.whats-next: You will receive a letter in two weeks
confirm.begin-process: We will begin processing your renewal application immediately. You can continue to use your Canadian Dental Care Plan benefits. You will receive a letter within two weeks of submitting your renewal application to let you know if you're eligible for the upcoming coverage year.
confirm.cdcp-checker: You can use the <cdcpLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan Status Checker</cdcpLink> or call <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap> to track the progress of your renewal application or to receive more information.
confirm.register-msca-title: Register for a My Service Canada Account
confirm.register-msca-text: <mscaLink>Register for a My Service Canada (MSCA)</mscaLink> account to view letters sent to you from the Government of Canada about your Canadian Dental Care Plan coverage.
confirm.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:
confirm.consent-answer: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
confirm.dental-private: Access to private dental insurance or coverage
confirm.is-parent: Parent or legal guardian of child

alert.title: Help us improve the Canadian Dental Care Plan
alert.survey: This short survey has 5 demographic questions and will take 3 minutes of your time. It will open in a new window.
alert.answers: Your answers will help Health Canada improve the Canadian Dental Care Plan and make sure our services are accessible to everyone.

modal.info: By closing the application, you will end your session and any information entered will be cleared from your browser. Make sure you printed or save a copy of your application code.
modal.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to close the application?
